name: Babel (memannyboi)
description:
Welcome to Babel

Climb the tower of Babel, what some call the birthplace of language itself, haunted by the voices of its victims and for you, the player, a daunting challenge lies ahead. Climb the tower by jumping platforms as they change colour, disappear and materialise as you jump. With voice work by some lovely people in several different languages (don't worry there is subtitles) 

Instructions can be found in the game

Created by

Manzur Elahi - Writer, Level Designer (thats me)

Diogo Lucas - Designer, Art Direction

Vejas Tarabilda - Programmer, Designer

Leon Brown - Designer
